mapper.insert: insert into i_staff (staff_name, birth_date, telephone_no, id_card, gender, emergency_contact, emergency_tel, empno, created_time, created_by, is_active ) values ( #{staffName}, #{birthDateAsStr}, #{telephoneNo}, #{idCard}, #{gender}, #{emergencyContact}, #{emergencyTel}, #{empno}, now(), #{createdBy},'Y' )
mapper.update: update i_staff set staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, telephone_no = #{telephoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emergency_tel = #{emergencyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, empno = #{empno,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, staff_name, birth_date, telephone_no, id_card, gender, emergency_contact, emergency_tel, empno, created_time, created_by, update_time, update_by, version, is_active from i_staff where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, staff_name, birth_date, telephone_no, id_card, gender, emergency_contact, emergency_tel, empno, created_time, created_by, update_time, update_by, version, is_active from i_staff

select id,staff_name,birth_date,telephone_no,id_card,gender,emergency_contact,emergency_tel, empno,is_active,created_by,created_time,update_by,update_time from i_staff where staff_name like concat('%',#{iStaff.staffName},'%') and empno like concat('%',#{iStaff.empno},'%') limit #{start},#{quantity}
select count(id) count from i_staff where staff_name like concat('%',#{staffName},'%') and empno like concat('%',#{empno},'%')

select id, staff_name, birth_date, telephone_no, id_card, gender, emergency_contact, emergency_tel, empno, created_time, created_by, update_time, update_by, version, is_active from i_staff where empno = #{empno}
mapper.update: update i_staff set is_active = #{isActive} where id = #{id}
